title: Award-winning Irish playwright Brian Friel dead at 86
text:
Published By: Reuters - Arts - Today 
DUBLIN (Reuters) - Brian Friel, Ireland's best known playwright of the latter half of the 20th century whose plays including "Dancing at Lug...
